ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Finance of ARTHUR WILLIAM MCMACKIN of Rothesay, New Brunswick, as a director of the Board of Directors of PPP Canada Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
